resources.string: Scan the QR code in StudioPro
Your local Mendix Studio Pro URL
Browse through a range of sample apps
Tap with three fingers to restart your app. Tap and hold to bring up the context menu
Scan the Studio Pro QR code to preview and debug your Mendix project
Scan the SP QR code to instantly preview and debug your project.
Restart your app with a simple tap of three fingers. Access the context menu by tapping and holding.
Access your favorite previously visited URLs without the need to retype them.
To be able to scan QR codes, the app will now request access to the camera. Please accept the request.
To be able to receive notifications, the app will now request access to the notification. Please accept the request.

Metro Bundler is not running at: %1$s

Please try followings

1.		Check that your app is running in Studio Pro
2.		Check that IP is correct and accessible
3.		Check that port %2$s and port 8083 are accessible>

Mendix runtime is not running at: %1$s

Please try followings

1.		Check that port %2$s is accessible
2.		Check that native profile is used
3.		Verify that Metro is running (You might need to restart Windows)

It seems you\'re trying to connect to a Mendix application that is not supported by this version of the app.\n\nPlease refer to our documentation to learn how to get the correct version of this app for your project.
You are trying to connect to an older version of Mendix Studio Pro which is not supported.
Your Mendix app does not have a Native Mobile Profile.
The packager is not running. Restart your runtime and try again.
It seems that there is an error in the app that is preventing it from functioning properly.\n\nPlease take a look at the options below to tackle the problem and get the app back on track.

This device does not support all features required for AR. 

This message can be safely ignored if you do not plan on testing AR with this device. 

Features missing:"
AR is not fully supported on this device!
How to use Make it Native app
No apps have been launched yet.
